TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TimeSpanConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供将 对象与其他表示形式相互转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换器只能将对象转换为字符串和从字符串转换。This converter can only convert a object to and from a string. 有关类型转换器的详细信息, 请参阅基类和[如何:实现类型转换器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). > [!NOTE] > 永远不应创建的实例。You should never create an instance of a . 而应调用 类的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 有关详细信息, 请参阅基类中的示例。For more information, see the examples in the base class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将类型的变量转换为字符串, 反之亦然。The following code example converts a variable of type to a string, and vice versa. 这两个变量都以格式表示。Both variables are represented in format. [!code-cpp[Converters#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CPP/converters.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[Converters#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CS/converters.cs#21)] [!code-vb[Converters#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/VB/converters.vb#21)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换器只能将对象转换为字符串和从字符串转换。This converter can only convert a object to and from a string. `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

summary.span: 将给定对象转换为其他类型。

span.span: Converts the given object to another type.
The converted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法最常用于在类型与字符串对象之间进行转换。This method most commonly converts types to and from string objects. 如果对象有效而且目标类型是字符串，则默认实现将调用对象上的 。The default implementation will make a call to on the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is string. 如果此方法无法转换为目标类型, 则将引发。If this method cannot convert to the destination type, it will throw a . `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
